37#ifndef BINIO_H
38#define BINIO_H
39
40#include "ntp_stdlib.h"
41
42long get_lsb_short (unsigned char **);
43void put_lsb_short (unsigned char **, long);
44long get_lsb_long (unsigned char **);
45void put_lsb_long (unsigned char **, long);
46
47#define get_lsb_int16( _x_ ) ((int16_t) get_lsb_short( _x_ ))
48#define get_lsb_uint16( _x_ ) ((uint16_t) get_lsb_short( _x_ ))
49#define get_lsb_int32( _x_ ) ((int32_t) get_lsb_long( _x_ ))
50#define get_lsb_uint32( _x_ ) ((uint32_t) get_lsb_long( _x_ ))
51
52long get_msb_short (unsigned char **);
53void put_msb_short (unsigned char **, long);
54long get_msb_long (unsigned char **);
55void put_msb_long (unsigned char **, long);
56
57#define get_msb_int16( _x_ ) ((int16_t) get_msb_short( _x_ ))
58#define get_msb_uint16( _x_ ) ((uint16_t) get_msb_short( _x_ ))
59#define get_msb_int32( _x_ ) ((int32_t) get_msb_long( _x_ ))
60#define get_msb_uint32( _x_ ) ((uint32_t) get_msb_long( _x_ ))
61
62#endif
63/*
64 * History:
65 *
66 * binio.h,v
67 * Revision 4.5 2005/04/16 17:32:10 kardel
68 * update copyright
69 *
70 * Revision 4.4 2004/11/14 15:29:41 kardel
71 * support PPSAPI, upgrade Copyright to Berkeley style
72 *
73 * Revision 4.2 1998/06/28 16:52:15 kardel
74 * added binio MSB prototypes for {get,put}_msb_{short,long}
75 *
76 * Revision 4.1 1998/06/12 15:07:40 kardel
77 * fixed prototyping
78 *
79 * Revision 4.0 1998/04/10 19:50:38 kardel
80 * Start 4.0 release version numbering
81 *
82 * Revision 1.1 1998/04/10 19:27:32 kardel
83 * initial NTP VERSION 4 integration of PARSE with GPS166 binary support
84 *
85 * Revision 1.1 1997/10/06 20:55:37 kardel
86 * new parse structure
87 *
